content.rendered:
Directed by Meghna Gulzar

Written by Meghna Gulzar. Bhavani Iyer. Meghna Gulzar

Cast Alia Bhatt (Sehmat Khan). Vicky Kaushal (Iqbal Syed). Rajit Kapoor (Hidayat Khan). Shishir Sharma (Brigadier Parvez Syed). Ashwath Bhatt (Mehboob Syed). Jaideep Ahlawat (Khalid Mir). Soni Razdan (Teji). Arif Zakaria (Abdul). Amruta Khanvilkar (Munira). Kanwaljeet Singh(Nikhil Bakshi (Older) (as Kanwaljit Singh)). Aman Vasishth(Nikhil Bakshi (Younger)). Veer Samra (Nafisa). Saloni (Nurse at Military Hospital). Deepak Saini (Tailor In Lahore). Sima Pari (Shyama). Pramod Pathak (Kabir Murtuza). Sukesh Mishra (Saadiq). Dharmik Joysar (Zain Beig). Jogi Mallang(Admiral Nair (as Jogi)). Gulista Alija (Salma). Ravi Aneja (Doctor at Military Hospital). Alok Arora (Raw Agent). Ajay Arya (Inspection Bureau Officer 1). Khushboo Atre (Teacher). Navdeep Bandhu (Driver Rafiq). Kapil Banga (ISI Agent). Agaaz (Kid At Army School). Pallavi Batra (Mitali). Santhosh Chand (Orderly At Syed House). Kanika Dang(Suraiya Siddiqui). Ishita Dasgupta (Housekeeper At Siddiqui Residence). Desh Deepak (ISI Agent). Kanishka Singh Deo (Hostel Maid). Amol Deshmukh(Col.Siddiqui). Nilofar Gesawat (Nazima Beig). Sanjay Gurbaxani (Navy Officer). Jitender Hooda (Raw Agent). Rajesh Jais (Sarwar). Jairoop Jeevan (General Beig). Vishal Kapoor (Bashir Ahmed’s Driver). Midhat Ullah Khan (Umbrella Seller / Binocular Man). Khushi (Kid At Army School). Kritik (Kid At Army School). Lakshbir (Kid At Army School). Manan Madaan (Kid At Army School). Madhubala (Teacher). Marangel (Kid At Army School). Miren (Kid At Army School). Naman (Kid At Army School). Udit Ohri (Raw Agent). Saumya Pahwa (Teacher). Parth(Kid At Army School). Manoj Rawat (Paanwala). Syed Rizwan (Perfume Seller). Simran Sachdev (Pallavi Murtaza (as Simran Sachdeva)). Yogesh Sahotra (Siddiqui’s Driver). Seerat (Kid At Army School). Devarashi Shah(Cadet). Adreeja Sharma (Teacher). Pradeep Sharma (Army Officer Outside). Vikas Shukla (Raw Agent). Lovely Sidhu (Soldier At Pakistan Headquarters). Amy Singh(Teacher). Angad Singh(ISI Agent). Balendar Singh(Driver Ismail (as Balendra Singh)). Harmanpal Singh(ISI Agent). Hearty Singh(Anwar Siddiqui). Ikkatar Singh(Driver Wasim). Vartika Singh(Teacher). Sukhraj (Kid At Army School). Sanjay Suri (Samar Syed). Tanish(Kid At Army School). Gurpreet Toti (Inspection Bureau Officer 3 (as Gurpreet Totti)). Ankur Tripathi (Imtiyaz). Sandeep Hemnaoni (Pakistani IB Officer (as Sundip Ved)) . Backagaindancer (Ansh). Azzy Bagria ((as Bagria Azzy)). Rajvir Chauhan (ISI Agent). Cricknowle (Vicky).Md Anan Islam. Victor Richard Junior (Victor (as Richard Junior Victor)). Midhat Khan (Umbrella seller). Sara Kohly (Lilian).Chandramogli Madem. Mukesh Marko (Bunty). Al Yasaha Naim (Al Yasaha). Vikash Rajput (Vikash Rajput). RoksolanaHasekiHÃ¼rrem (Customer / Transitive (credit only)). Chobber Sidhu (Dialogue Writter). Ankit Srivastav (Army). Rahul Srivastav (Singer & Friend). Shreya Bhattacharya (Nimmi (uncredited))

Languages Hindi

Producers Sumit Chawla. Naman Chouhan. Vineet Jain. Hiroo Johar. Karan Johar. Hetvi Karia. Apoorva Mehta. Somen Mishra. Priti Shahani. Somesh Shivraj

Production Dharma Production. Junglee Picture
